Extract a particular value from a tidygedcom object

Source: R/helpers.R
gedcom_value.Rd

Extract a particular value from a tidygedcom object

gedcom_value(gedcom, record_xref, tag, level, after_tag = NULL)

Arguments

gedcom

A tidygedcom object
record_xref

The xref of the record in which the value may exist
tag

The tag associated with the value
level

The level number of the value
after_tag

Whether the tag should be subordinate to this parent tag

Value

The particular value fitting the criteria of the input arguments. If not value is found, an empty string is returned. The function will automatically combine values split over CONT and CONC tags.

Contents
